status.description: Processing status of the request (success, error, or partial completion)

code.description: Error code identifier for programmatic handling

field.description: Specific field that triggered the error

severity.description: Error severity level (critical error or advisory warning)

errors.description: List of errors encountered during processing, null if no errors

profileStatement.description: Compelling professional summary (max 750 chars) highlighting experience, expertise, and value proposition

strengths.description: Effective aspects of the profile statement

areas_to_improve.description: Suggestions to enhance profile statement impact and relevance

feedback.description: Evaluation of profile statement quality and alignment with target role

data.description: Container for optimized profile statement and evaluation feedback
